title: How to Make a Three Step Raspberry Swirl Cheesecake

steps.headline: Add the graham cracker crumbs, sugar and margarine to a mixing bowl
Press the crumbs into a 9-inch springform pan.
Add the cream cheese and sugar to a mixing bowl.
Add eggs to the cream cheese.
Pour the cream cheese mixture into the prepared crust.
Swirl the jam with a knife making a zig-zag pattern.
steps.description: You should aim for a marbled effect.

steps.headline: Bake the cheesecake at 350 °F (177 °C) for 40 minutes or until the center is set.
Refrigerate overnight and then cut into 10 to 12 slices.

text: Crust Add the graham cracker crumbs, sugar and margarine to a mixing bowl  Mix to combine.  Press the crumbs into a 9-inch springform pan.  Filling Add the cream cheese and sugar to a mixing bowl. Beat. Add eggs to the cream cheese. Add the eggs one-at-a-time. Mix until just blended.  Pour the cream cheese mixture into the prepared crust.  Dot with raspberry jam.  Swirl the jam with a knife making a zig-zag pattern. You should aim for a marbled effect. Bake the cheesecake at 350 °F (177 °C) for 40 minutes or until the center is set.  Refrigerate overnight and then cut into 10 to 12 slices.
